content.content: In may centralized finance systems we can pay via invoices, but in ethereum I missed that in may cases so I decided to build a one, a simple standard to create, pay, cancel invoices which users can use it to pay invoices with specific token, and amount of it as well The standard example can be found at : GitHub - ProgramFilesx86/example-invoice-standard Create : to create an invoice Pay : to pay a specific invoice Cancel : to cancel a specific invoice this standard can be implemented as contracts by tokens (as such usdc / dai) so users will use it to pay their invoices with such tokens, the token company will have fees as well and many other cases can be used
content.GPT-summary: The author is explaining a proposal for a simple standard to create, pay, and cancel invoices using Ethereum. The proposal can be implemented as contracts by tokens such as USDC or DAI. A third party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
